title: Faux-leather Logo Hoodie
description: Congratulations! You've found the snowflake! Faux-leather details and a vertical logo give signature, on-trend street style to this sporty hoodie.

title: Foil-print Pullover Hoodie
description: Congratulations! You've found the snowflake! Our classic logo gets an update in this unique foil printing with a distressed feel.

title: Heathered Full-zip Hoodie
description: Our soft marled hoodie features a pop of color at the hood, hem and cuffs for added visual interest.

title: Colorblock Mesh Hoodie
description: Mesh insets and a colorblock motif update the classic hoodie for a sporty, street style feel.

title: Signature A|x Hoodie
description: ONLINE EXCLUSIVE. Tonal, embroidered logos give low-key signature style to this sporty hoodie.

title: Plush-lined Hoodie
description: Faux-fur lining adds an extra layer of comfort and warmth to this hoodie, featuring a two-way zipper, split kangaroo pocket and logo detail.

title: Full-zip Athlete Hoodie
description: Heather grey style made of 80% cotton/20% polyester fleece. All other styles made of 70% cotton/30% polyester fleece. Trim and lining made of 100% cotton jersey. Ribbed sleeve cuffs and hem made of 100% cottonFront zipper closure and pockets. Graphic at either left chest, full chest or right sleeve based on style. Pre-washed for a gentle feel and to reduce shrinkage. Imported.

title: Full-zip Athlete Hoodie
description: Made of 72% cotton/28% polyester fleece, sueded for softness. Rib-knit hem and sleeve cuffs made of 100% cotton. Back neck binding and hood lining made of 100% cotton jersey. Full zipper closure. Graphic screen print at either left chest or center front. Front pockets. Pre-washed for a gentle feel and to reduce shrinkage. Imported.

title: Hooded Vegan Leather Jacket
description: An urban favourite, this hooded vegan leather jacket is basically your favourite hoodie, only warmer.- Outer: 100% polyurethane-Lining: 100% polyester- Wipe with a damp cloth as necessary - Hang to dry. Do not bleach. Model wears size: small. Model wears size: small.

title: Long Hoodie Sweater
description: Front zip closure with hood. 80% viscose 20% nylon. Model wear size: small.
